SELECT o."order_num" , o."user_num" , o."order_time" , b.BRANCH_NAME , o."total_price" , d."ea" , d."price" , d."shot_custom"
FROM "order_detail" d, "order" o , BRANCH b
WHERE d."order_num" IN ( SELECT "order_num" FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY o."order_time" DESC) AS rnum , o."order_num" FROM "order" o WHERE "user_num" = #{userNum} AND "order_time" >= (CURRENT_DATE-#{period}+1) ) WHERE (#{firstIndex}+5) > rnum AND rnum >= #{firstIndex} ) AND d."order_num" = o."order_num" AND o."branch_num" = b.BRANCH_NUM
ORDER BY o."order_num" DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "order" o , "order_detail" d WHERE o."user_num" = #{userNum} AND o."order_num" = d."order_num" AND o."order_time" >= (CURRENT_DATE - #{period} +1)
